title: Education Secretary, Nadhim Zahawi, responds to the publication of the Independent National Child Safeguarding Practice Review Panel's report

content.text: The Education Secretary, Nadhim Zahawi, has responded to the publication of the Independent National Child Safeguarding Practice Review Panel's report following the tragic deaths of Arthur Labinjo-Hughes and Star Hobson.
For more information about what we are doing to keep children safe, please visit: How we’re supporting families in need and keeping children safe - The Education Hub (blog.gov.uk).
